column1: Dear Sir Madam First of all may I take this opportunity to sincerely express my profound gratitude to all involved in Social and Health Care for your noble and important deeds to life May PERSON Bless You Yours and All Always I am also extremely grateful for a survey like this which shows how much you are striving to help us Our wonderful wonderful Earlscourt Medical Centre is just that wonderful in many many ways knowledge dedication compassion professionalism effectiveness I myself greatly admire all of Doctors and Staff there I cannot Thank You Management and Staff enough for your good heart May You Yours and All be always Healthy Happy and Successful ğŸ™ğŸ™ğŸ™ Please keep up the excellent work THANKS ğŸ˜Š Best wishes Thuy

The doctors and the medical staff here are very good as they look after the patients very well and also very helpful and understanding with patients needs They made you feel at ease talking about your medical condition and keep you informed at all times reassuring that help is always there Very pleased with this medical centre and been with them for well over 30 years
